chapter.title: About This Guide
chapter.para: The purpose of this guide is to get you up and running quickly with JBoss Messaging 1.0.1. JBoss Messaging is a complete rewrite of JBossMQ and the future JEMS JMS provider, as well as the JBoss ESB backbone.
This guide is work in progress. Please send your suggestions or comments to the JBoss Messaging user forum.
Other contributions by: Adrian Brock, Bela Ban, Alex Fu, Aaron Walker
